text: - We are a company of builders.

We like people who have
their ears on the ground.
They listen to our customers.

- Builder. If I were to
say, what builder means,
it's about taking ownership.

- We often think about
builders as somebody who codes.
Full transparency, I don't code
but I think the builder's mentality
is somebody who's looking innovate.
- You get to actually be hands on,

creating new architectures
and creating new solutions.
- To be able to improve citizen's

daily lives really has an
impact on your day to day life.
The lines of code that you will write,
they will be used and you get to do so
in an environment where you can learn.
- AWS isn't for everybody,
it really takes a builder's mentality.
But if you're really interested in growing

and doing big things and
having lots of opportunity
to experiment, we're totally that.

- We think collectively,
but we build as one.
- We are all empowered to connect
and build community.
That's a pretty cool place to work.
